results.name: Binary sequence starting with 1 and with run lengths given by the ruler sequence A001511.
xref: The 1's are located at indices given by A005187(2n+1) = A005187(2n)+1 = A120738(n)+1. - _N. J. A. Sloane_ and _M. F. Hasler_, Jan 22 2015
results.author: _M. F. Hasler_, Jan 13 2015
